welcomeDesc: To help you find the perfect travel companions and create amazing adventures, we need to know a bit more about you.
genderDesc: This helps us provide better travel recommendations and connect you with compatible travel buddies.
ageDesc: Age helps us match you with travelers in similar life stages and age-appropriate activities.
languageDesc: Language compatibility makes travel experiences smoother and more enjoyable for everyone.
languageError: Please select at least one language
profileCompletedError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
onboardingToastSuccess: Welcome to WanderBuddies! Your profile is now complete.
